## Description {#details}

Holds the set of Partitions.

It populates them, merges them and then clones the loops.

Definition at line 271 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.

### addToCyclicPartition() {#ad3b1855aab0d6db5fca73b22ba442b50}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::InstPartitionContainer::addToCyclicPartition (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Adds <code>Inst</code> into the current partition if that is marked to contain cycles.

Otherwise start a new partition for it.

### computePartitionSetForPointers() {#a223e50a7d4a7c2c8290b0697da780758}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt; int, 8 &gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::InstPartitionContainer::computePartitionSetForPointers (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopaccessinfo">LoopAccessInfo</a> &amp; LAI)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
For each memory pointer, it computes the partitionId the pointer is used in.

This returns an array of int where the I-th entry corresponds to I-th entry in LAI.getRuntimePointerCheck(). If the pointer is used in multiple partitions its entry is set to -1.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp/#l00497">497</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### mergeAdjacentNonCyclic() {#ad74de3edd28eb2b13222a27d529d91b7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::InstPartitionContainer::mergeAdjacentNonCyclic ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Merges adjacent non-cyclic partitions.

The idea is that we currently only want to isolate the non-vectorizable partition. We could later allow more distribution among these partition too.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp/#l00305">305</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.

### mergeNonIfConvertible() {#a208d5ae0644e0733519a9a77a64f6eb0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::InstPartitionContainer::mergeNonIfConvertible ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
If a partition contains only conditional stores, we won&#39;t vectorize it.

Try to merge it with a previous cyclic partition.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp/#l00312">312</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.

### mergeToAvoidDuplicatedLoads() {#a154fa6f1a3465a4e2e103cf22d888a33}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::InstPartitionContainer::mergeToAvoidDuplicatedLoads ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Merges partitions in order to ensure that no loads are duplicated.

We can&#39;t duplicate loads because that could potentially reorder them. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopaccessanalysis">LoopAccessAnalysis</a> provides dependency information with the context that the order of memory operation is preserved.

Return if any partitions were merged.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp/#l00344">344</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InstToPartitionId {#aa6309892d349abf45028f6e6b64bb2c1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>InstToPartitionIdT anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::InstPartitionContainer::InstToPartitionId</>}>
Mapping from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> to partition Id.

If the instruction belongs to multiple partitions the entry contains -1.
